main event: A witness reported seeing a small, round object about the size of a basketball making a straight level flight before disappearing behind trees.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 3-4 seconds,The witness could not determine any specific details such as color or texture,No sound or physical evidence was reported during the sighting,The object was believed to be neither an aircraft nor any known object,The object was described as self-luminous and bright white during a brief observation.
witness description: The witness was a male with flight experience.
